name: Stakeholder groups identified
description: All the different groups of stakeholders that are, or will be, affected by the development and operation of the software system are identified

name: Key Stakeholder groups represented
description: There is agreement on the stakeholder groups to be represented. At a minimum, the stakeholders groups that fund, use, support, and maintain the system have been considered.

name: Responsibilities defined
description: The responsibilities of the stakeholder representatives have been defined.

name: Responsibilities agreed
description: The stakeholder representatives have agreed to take on their responsibilities.

name: Representatives authorized
description: The stakeholder representatives are authorized to carry out their responsibilities.

name: Collaboration approach agreed
description: The collaboration approach among the stakeholder representatives has been agreed.

name: Way of working supported & respected
description: The stakeholder representative's support and respect the team's way of working.

name: Representatives assist the team
description: The stakeholder representatives assist the team in accordance with their responsibilities.

name: Timely feedback and decision provided
description: The stakeholder representatives provide feedback and take part in decision making in a timely manner.

name: Changes promptly communicated
description: The stakeholder representatives promptly communicate changes that are relevant for their stakeholder groups.

name: Minimal expectation agreed
description: The stakeholder representatives have agreed upon their minimal expectations for the next deployment of the new system.

name: Rep's happy with their involvement
description: The stakeholder representatives are happy with their involvement in the work.

name: Rep's input valued
description: The stakeholder representatives agree that their input is valued by the team and treated with respect.

name: Team's input valued
description: The team members agree that their input is valued by the stakeholder representatives and treated with respect.

name: Priorities clear & perspectives balanced
description: The stakeholder representatives agree with how their different priorities and perspectives are being balanced to provide a clear direction for the team.

name: Stockholders feedback provided
description: The stakeholder representatives provide feedback on the system from their stakeholder group perspective.

name: System ready for deployment
description: The stakeholder representatives confirm that they agree that the system is ready for deployment.

name: Feedback on system use available
description: Stakeholders are using the new system and providing feedback on their experiences.

name: System meets expectation
description: The stakeholders confirm that the new system meets their expectations.

name: Idea behind opportunity identified
description: An idea for a way of improving current ways of working, increasing market share, or applying a new or innovative software system has been identified.

name: At least one investing stakeholder interested
Other stakeholders identified
description: The other stakeholders who share the opportunity have been identified.

name: Solution identified
description: The stakeholders in the opportunity and the proposed solution have been identified.

name: Stakeholders' needs established
description: The stakeholders' needs that generate the opportunity have been established.

name: Problems and root causes identified
description: Any underlying problems and their root causes have been identified.

name: Need for a solution confirmed
description: It has been confirmed that a software-based solution is needed.

name: At least ane solution proposed
description: At least one software-based solution has been proposed.

name: Opportunity value quantified
description: The value of addressing the opportunity has been quantified either in absolute terms or in returns or savings per time period (e.g. per annum).

name: Solution impact understood
description: The impact of the solution on the stakeholders is understood.

name: System value understood
description: The value that the software system offers to the stakeholders that fund and use the software system is understood.

name: Success criteria clear
description: The success criteria by which the deployment of the software system is to be judged are clear.

name: Outcomes clear and quantified
description: The desired outcomes required of the solution are clear and quantified.

name: Solution outlined
description: A solution has been outlined.

name: Solution possible within constraints
description: The indications are that the solution can be developed and deployed within constraints.

name: Risks acceptable & manageable
description: The risks associated with the solution are acceptable and manageable.

name: Solution profitable
description: The indicative (ball-park) costs of the solution are less than the anticipated value of the opportunity.

name: Reasons to develop solution understood
description: The reasons for the development of a software-based solution are understood by all members of the team.

name: Pursuit viable
description: It is clear that the pursuit of the opportunity is viable.

name: Opportunity addressed
description: A usable system that demonstrably addresses the opportunity is available.

name: Solution worth deploying
description: The stakeholders agree that the available solution is worth deploying.

name: Stakeholders satisfied
description: The stakeholders are satisfied that the solution produced addresses the opportunity.

name: Solution accrues benefits
description: The solution has started to accrue benefits for the stakeholders.

name: ROI acceptable
description: The return-on-investment profile is at least as good as anticipated.

name: Stakeholders agree system is to be produced
description: The initial set of stakeholders agrees that a system is to be produced.

name: Users identified
description: The stakeholders that will use the new system are identified.

name: Funding stakeholders identified
description: The stakeholders that will fund the initial work on the new system are identified.

name: Opportunity clear
description: There is a clear opportunity for the new system to address.

name: Development stakeholders identified
description: The stakeholders involved in developing the new system are identified.

name: System purpose agreed
description: The stakeholders agree on the purpose of the new system.

name: System success clear
description: It is clear what success is for the new system.

name: Shared solution understanding exist
description: The stakeholders have a shared understanding of the extent of the proposed solution.

name: Requirement's format agreed
description: The way the requirements will be described is agreed upon.

name: Requirements management in place
description: The mechanisms for managing the requirements are in place.

name: Prioritization scheme clear
description: The prioritization scheme is clear.

name: Constraints identified &considered
description: Constraints are identified and considered.

name: Assumptions clear
description: Assumptions are clearly stated.

name: Requirements shared
description: The requirements are captured and shared with the team and the stakeholders.

name: Requirements' origin clear
description: The origin of the requirements is clear.

name: Rationale clear
description: The rationale behind the requirements is clear.

name: Conflicts addressed
description: Conflicting requirements are identified and attended to.

name: Essential characteristics clear
description: The requirements communicate the essential characteristics of the system to be delivered.

name: Key usage scenarios explained
description: The most important usage scenarios for the system can be explained.

name: Priorities clear
description: The priority of the requirements is clear.

name: Impact understood
description: The impact of implementing the requirements is understood.

name: Team knows &agrees on what to deliver
description: The team understands what has to be delivered and agrees to deliver it.

name: Acceptable solution described
description: The stakeholders accept that the requirements describe an acceptable solution.

name: Change under control
description: The rate of change to the agreed requirements is relatively low and under control.

name: Value to be realized clear
description: The value provided by implementing the requirements is clear.

name: Clear how opportunity addressed
description: The parts of the opportunity satisfied by the requirements are clear.

name: Testable
description: The requirements are testable.

name: Enough addressed to be acceptable
description: Enough of the requirements are addressed for the resulting system to be acceptable to the stakeholders.

name: Requirements and system match
description: The stakeholders accept the requirements as accurately reflecting what the system does and does not do.

name: Value realized clear
description: The set of requirement items implemented provide clear value to the stakeholders.

name: System worth making operational
description: The system implementing the requirements is accepted by the stakeholders as worth making operational.

name: Stakeholders accept requirements
description: The stakeholders accept the requirements as accurately capturing what they require to fully satisfy the need for a new system.

name: No hindering requirements
description: There are no outstanding requirement items preventing the system from being accepted as fully satisfying the requirements.

name: Requirements fully satisfied
description: The system is accepted by the stakeholders as fully satisfying the requirements.

name: Architecture selection criteria agreed
description: The criteria to be used when selecting the architecture have been agreed on.

name: HW platform identified
description: Hardware platforms have been identified.

name: Technologies selected
description: Programming languages and technologies to be used have been selected.

name: System boundary known
description: System boundary is known.

name: Decision on system organization made
description: Significant decisions about the organization of the system have been made.

name: Buy, build, reuse decisions made
description: Buy, build and reuse decisions have been made.

name: Key technical risks agreed to
description: Key technical risks agreed to.

name: Key architecture characteristics demonstrated
description: Key architectural characteristics have been demonstrated.

name: System exercised &perfomance measured
description: The system can be exercised and its performance can be measured.

name: Critical HW configurations demonstrated
description: Critical hardware configurations have been demonstrated.

name: Critical interfaces demonstrated
description: Critical interfaces have been demonstrated.

name: Integration with environment demonstrated
description: The integration with other existing systems has been demonstrated.

name: Architecture accepted as fit-for-purpose
description: The relevant stakeholders agree that the demonstrated architecture is appropriate.

name: System can be operated
description: The system can be operated by stakeholders who use it.

name: System functionality tested
description: The functionality provided by the system has been tested.

name: System performance acceptable
description: The performance of the system is acceptable to the stakeholders.

name: Defect levels acceptable
description: Defect levels are acceptable to the stakeholders.

name: System fully documented
description: The system is fully documented.

name: Release content known
description: Release content is known.

name: Added value clear
description: The added value provided by the system is clear.

name: User documentation available
description: Installation and other user documentation are available.

name: System accepted as fit-for-purpose
description: The stakeholder representatives accept the system as fit-for-purpose.

name: Stakeholders want the system
description: The stakeholder representatives want to make the system operational.

name: Operational support in place
description: Operational support is in place.

name: System available for use
description: The system has been made available to the stakeholders intended to use it.

name: System live
description: At least one example of the system is fully operational.

name: Agreed service levels supported
description: The system is fully supported to the agreed service levels.

name: Replaced or discontinued
description: The system has been replaced or discontinued.

name: No longer supported
description: The system is no longer supported.

name: No authorized users
description: There are no 'official' stakeholders who still use the system.

name: Updates stopped
description: Updates to the system will no longer be produced.

name: Mission defined
description: The team mission has been defined in terms of the opportunities and outcomes.

name: Constraints known and defined
description: Constraints on the team's operation are known.

name: Growth mechanisms in place
description: Mechanisms to grow the team are in place.

name: Composition defined
description: The composition of the team is defined.

name: Responsibilities outlined
description: The team's responsibilities are outlined.

name: Required commitment level clear
description: The level of team commitment is clear.

name: Required competencies identified
description: Required competencies are identified.

name: Size determined
description: The team size is determined.

name: Governance rules defined
description: Governance rules are defined.

name: Leadership model selected
description: Leadership model is selected.

name: Enough members recruited
description: Enough team members have been recruited to enable the work to progress.

name: Roles understood
description: Every team member understands how the team is organized and what their individual role is.

name: How to work understood
description: All team members understand how to perform their work.

name: Members introduced
description: The team members have met (perhaps virtually) and are beginning to get to know each other.

name: Individual responsibilities accepted and aligned to competencies
description: The team members understand their responsibilities and how they align with their competencies.

name: Members accepting work
description: Team members are accepting work.

name: External collaborators identified
description: Any external collaborators (organizations, teams and individuals) are identified.

name: Communication mechanisms defined
description: Team communication mechanisms have been defined.

name: Members commit to team
description: Each team member commits to working on the team as defined.

name: Works as one unit
description: The team is working as one cohesive unit.

name: Communication open and honest
description: Communication within the team is open and honest.

name: Focused on mission
description: The team is focused on achieving the team mission.

name: Members know each other
description: The team members know each other.

name: Consistently meeting commitments
description: The team consistently meets its commitments.

name: Continuously adapting to change
description: The team continuously adapts to the changing context.

name: Addresses problems
description: The team identifies and addresses problems without outside help.

name: Rework and backtracking minimized
description: Effective progress is being achieved with minimal avoidable backtracking and reworking.

name: Waste continuously eliminated
description: Wasted work, and the potential for wasted work are continuously eliminated.

name: Responsibilities fulfilled
description: The team responsibilities have been handed over or fulfilled.

name: Members available to other teams
description: The team members are available for assignment to other teams.

name: Mission concluded
description: No further effort is being put in by the team to complete the mission.

name: Team actively support principles
description: Principles and constraints are committed to by the team.

name: Stakeholders agree with principles
description: Principles and constraints are agreed to by the stakeholders.

name: Tool needs agreed
description: The tool needs of the work and its stakeholders are agreed.

name: Approach recommended
description: A recommendation for the approach to be taken is available.

name: Operational context understood
description: The context within which the team will operate is understood.

name: Practice & tool constraints known
description: The constraints that apply to the selection, acquisition and use of practices and tools are known.

name: Key practices & tools selected
description: The key practices and tools that form the foundation of the way-of-working are selected.

name: Practices needed to start work agreed
description: Enough practices for work to start are agreed to by the team.

name: Non-negotiable practices & tool identified
description: All non-negotiable practices and tools have been identified.

name: Gaps between available and needed way of working understood
description: The gaps that exist between the practices and tools that are needed and the practices and tools that are available have been analyzed and understood.

name: Gaps in capability understood
description: The capability gaps that exist between what is needed to execute the desired way of working and the capability levels of the team have been analyzed and understood.

name: Integrated way of working available
description: The selected practices and tools have been integrated to form a usable way-of-working.

name: Practices & tools in use
description: The practices and tools are being used to do real work.

name: Regularly inspected
description: The use of the practices and tools selected are regularly inspected.

name: Adapted to context
description: The practices and tools are being adapted to the team's context.

name: Supported by team
description: The use of the practices and tools is supported by the team.

name: Feedback mechanisms in place
description: Procedures are in place to handle feedback on the team's way of working.

name: Practices & tools support collaboration
description: The practices and tools support team communication and collaboration.

name: Used by whole team
description: The practices and tools are being used by the whole team to perform their work.

name: Accessible to whole team
description: All team members have access to the practices and tools required to do their work.

name: Inspected and adapted by whole team
description: The whole team is involved in the inspection and adaptation of the way-of-working.

name: Predictable progress being made
description: Team members are making progress as planned by using and adapting the way-of-working to suit their current context.

name: Practices naturally applied
description: The team naturally applies the practices without thinking about them.

name: Tools  naturally support way-of-working
description: The tools naturally support the way that the team works.

name: Continually tuned
description: The team continually tunes their use of the practices and tools.

name: No longer in use
description: The team's way of working is no longer being used.

name: Lessons learned shared
description: Lessons learned are shared for future use.

name: Required result clear
description: The result required of the work being initiated is clear.

name: Constraints clear
description: Any constraints on the work's performance are clearly identified.

name: Funding stakeholders known
description: The stakeholders that will fund the work are known.

name: Initiator identified
description: The initiator of the work is clearly identified.

name: Accepting stockholders known
description: The stakeholders that will accept the results are known.

name: Source of founding clear
description: The source of funding is clear.

name: Priority clear
description: The priority of the work is clear.

name: Commitment made
description: Commitment is made.

name: Cost and effort estimated
description: Cost and effort of the work are estimated.

name: Resources availability understood
description: Resource availability is understood.

name: Risk exposure understood
description: Risk exposure is understood.

name: Acceptance criteria established
description: Acceptance criteria are defined and agreed with client.

name: Sufficiently broken down to start
description: The work is broken down sufficiently for productive work to start.

name: Tasks identified and prioritized
description: Tasks have been identified and prioritized by the team and stakeholders.

name: Credible plan in place
description: A credible plan is in place.

name: Funding in place
description: Funding to start the work is in place.

name: At least one team member ready
description: The team or at least some of the team members are ready to start the work.

name: Integration points defined
description: Integration and delivery points are defined.

name: Development started
description: Development work has been started.

name: Progress monitored
description: Work progress is monitored.

name: Definition of done in place
description: The work is being broken down into actionable work items with clear definitions of done.

name: Tasks being progressed
description: Team members are accepting and progressing tasks.

name: Tasks being completed
description: Tasks are being completed.

name: Unplanned work under control
description: Unplanned work is under control.

name: Risks under control
description: Risks are under control as the impact if they occur and the likelihood of them occurring have been reduced to acceptable levels.

name: Estimates revised to reflect performance
description: Estimates are revised to reflect the team's performance.

name: Progress measured
description: Measures are available to show progress and velocity.

name: Re-work under control
description: Re-work is under control.

name: Commitments consistently met
description: Tasks are consistently completed on time and within their estimates.

name: Only admin tasks left
description: All outstanding tasks are administrative housekeeping or related to preparing the next piece of work.

name: Results achieved
description: Work results have been achieved.

name: Resulting system accepted
description: The stakeholder(s) has accepted the resulting software system.

name: Lessons learned
description: Lessons learned have been itemized, recorded and discussed.

name: Metrics available
description: Metrics have been made available.

name: Everything archived
description: Everything has been archived.

name: Budget reconciled &closed
description: The budget has been reconciled and closed.

name: Team released
description: The team has been released.

name: No outstanding, uncompleted tasks
description: There are no outstanding, uncompleted tasks.

name: The components of the Software System included in the antipattern are defined
description: The components of the Software System included in the antipattern are defined

name: An antipattern type has been defined
description: An antipattern type has been defined.

name: The cost of antipattern fixing was estimated
description: The cost of antipattern fixing was estimated

name: An assessment of possible losses associated with the presence of an antipattern was carried out
description: An assessment of possible losses associated with the presence of an antipattern was carried out.

name: Refactoring completed
description: Refactoring completed.

name: Testing showed the correct work of the components included in the antipattern
description: Testing showed the correct work of the components included in the antipattern.

name: Antipattern elimination activity completed
description: Antipattern elimination activity completed.

name: Signs of poor-quality design or implementation of the Software System have been found
description: Signs of poor-quality design or implementation of the Software System have been found.

name: The boundaries of the low quality area in the Software System have been defined
description: The boundaries of the low quality area in the Software System have been defined.

name: Work Products associated with the inferior part of the Software System have been defined
description: Work Products associated with the inferior part of the Software System have been defined.

name: The Software System Elements included in the antipattern have been determined
description: The Software System Elements included in the antipattern have been determined.

name: The type of antipattern has been determined
description: The type of antipattern has been determined.

name: Dependencies of the Software System on the antipattern elements have been determined
description: Dependencies of the Software System on the antipattern elements have been determined.

name: The impact of the antipattern on the Software System has been estimated
description: The impact of the antipattern on the Software System has been estimated.

name: Possible options for refactoring have been identified
description: Possible options for refactoring have been identified.

name: The cost of the refactoring options has been assessed
description: The cost of the refactoring options has been assessed.

name: The most suitable refactoring method has been selected
description: The most suitable refactoring method has been selected.

name: The Software System elements included in the antipattern are completely covered by tests
description: The Software System elements included in the antipattern are completely covered by tests.

name: The antipattern has been refactored
description: The antipattern has been refactored.

name: Tests confirm that the Software System remains operational
description: Tests confirm that the Software System remains operational.

name: The Work Products related to the changed part of the Software System have been updated
description: The Work Products related to the changed part of the Software System have been updated.

name: Tests, reviews or other appropriate activities have been undertaken to ensure that the antipattern h
description: Tests, reviews or other appropriate activities have been undertaken to ensure that the antipattern has been corrected or shown not to actually be a fault or flaw.

name: The antipattern management has been finalized
description: The antipattern management has been finalized.

name: Technical debt has decreased
description: Technical debt has decreased.

name: The antipattern is recognized as mandatory for elimination
description: The antipattern is recognized as mandatory for elimination
